Package dd.operations

Class ConstraintOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • dd.operations.ConstraintOperation
  • public class ConstraintOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    The class dedicated to perform on-the-fly constraint operations

      • allDiff

        public static DecisionDiagram allDiff​(DecisionDiagram result,
                                      DecisionDiagram mdd,
                                      SetOf<java.lang.Integer> V,
                                      SetOf<java.lang.Integer> variables)
        Perform the intersection operation between mdd and an alldiff constraint
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will store the result
        mdd - The MDD on which to perform the operation
        V - The set of constrained values
        variables - The set of constrained variables
        Returns:
        the MDD resulting from the intersection between mdd and the alldiff constraint

      • sum

        public static DecisionDiagram sum​(DecisionDiagram result,
                                  DecisionDiagram mdd,
                                  int min,
                                  int max,
                                  SetOf<java.lang.Integer> variables)
        Perform the intersection operation between mdd and a sum constraint
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will store the result
        mdd - The MDD on which to perform the operation
        min - The minimum value of the sum
        max - The maximum value of the sum
        variables - The set of all constrained variables
        Returns:
        the MDD resulting from the intersection between mdd and the sum constraint

      • sum

        public static DecisionDiagram sum​(DecisionDiagram result,
                                  DecisionDiagram mdd,
                                  int min,
                                  int max,
                                  MapOf<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.Integer> map,
                                  SetOf<java.lang.Integer> variables)
        Perform the intersection operation between mdd and a sum constraint. The map makes the link between a label and its sum value.
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will store the result
        mdd - The MDD on which to perform the operation
        min - The minimum value of the sum
        max - The maximum value of the sum
        map - The map associating label â†’ value
        variables - The set of all constrained variables
        Returns:
        the MDD resulting from the intersection between mdd and the sum constraint

        Parameters:

        mdd - The MDD on which to perform the operation
        maxValues - The GCC values
        variables - The set of all constrained variables

      • sequence

        public static DecisionDiagram sequence​(DecisionDiagram result,
                                       DecisionDiagram mdd,
                                       int q,
                                       int min,
                                       int max,
                                       SetOf<java.lang.Integer> V,
                                       SetOf<java.lang.Integer> variables)
        Perform the intersection operation between mdd and a sequence constraint
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will store the result
        mdd - The MDD on which to perform the operation
        q - The size of the sequence
        min - The minimum number of appearances of a value in the sequence
        max - The maximum number of appearances of a value in the sequence
        V - The set of constrained values
        variables - The set of all constrained variables
        Returns:
        the MDD resulting from the intersection between mdd and the sequence constraint

      • intersection

        protected static void intersection​(DecisionDiagram result,
                                   DecisionDiagram mdd,
                                   SNode constraint)
        Perform the intersection operation between the given mdd and the given constraint
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will store the result
        mdd - The MDD on which to perform the operation
        constraint - The PNode containing the constraint (= root node of the constraint)

      • intersection

        protected static void intersection​(DecisionDiagram result,
                                   DecisionDiagram mdd,
                                   SNode constraint,
                                   boolean relaxation)
        Perform the intersection operation between the given mdd and the given constraint
        Parameters:
        result - The MDD that will store the result
        mdd - The MDD on which to perform the operation
        constraint - The PNode containing the constraint (= root node of the constraint)
        relaxation - True if you perform a relaxation on the constraint, false otherwise
